item.title: Angular async pipe pitfalls
item.description: The async pipe is one of my favourite features in Angular, but I recently came across some pitfalls with change detection, which I wanted to share...

item.title: Using Angular CLI with ASP.NET Core
item.description: It is possible to integrate the convenience of Angular CLI into a ASP.NET Core application - find out how!

item.title: All good things come in threes
item.description: Why it took me three tries to create this blog and what I learned on the way

item.title: Building Command-Line-Interfaces with Node.js
item.description: This tutorial will guide you through the steps required to create and publish expressive, cross-platform CLI applications with Node.js and Commander.js.

item.title: How to quickly turn your csproj into a NuGet package
item.description: This week I will show you how you can create a NuGet package from your .Net project in three simple steps and how to create a super simple nuget feed.

item.title: Use DocFx to document your existing .Net application
item.description: DocFx can build static html documentation pages from your .Net aplication.
